timeline.message: allow check for exist w/o creating
dont' create blockmanaagaer, shutdownmanager if not present

timeline.bodyText: Should this method and the method preceding it (containsDefault) not be the same method?
timeline.author: rhwood

replies.bodyText:
Probably.  I think I managed to confuse myself with the multiple meanings of "default" here.
containsDefault creates a List<T> and fires a property event, but the list is empty so there's no default item.
replies.author: bobjacobsen

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/java/src/jmri/InstanceManager.java b/java/src/jmri/InstanceManager.java
index bc4bf31168..498db956a8 100644
--- a/java/src/jmri/InstanceManager.java
+++ b/java/src/jmri/InstanceManager.java

@@ -424,7 +428,9 @@ public final class InstanceManager {
 
     /**
      * Check if a particular type has been initialized without
-     * triggering an automatic initialization.
+     * triggering an automatic initialization. The existence or
+     * non-existence of the corresponding list is not changed, and 
+     * no PropertyChangeEvent is fired.
      *
      * @param <T>  The type of the class
      * @param type The class type
